description: embroidered square with red striped border with tabs on one side; center square with eight pointed star; predominately cross stitch in mostly white, rust, red and orange; red, blue and yellow beads with attached red tassels on three sides; silk tassels on two sides; wool (?) tassels on one side
dimension:
23 13/16 x 21 1/8 in. (60.48 x 53.66 cm) (including tabs)
7 in. (17.78 cm) (object part, shorter tassels)
11 1/4 in. (28.58 cm) (object part, longer tassels)
title: Wedding head cover
